column1: One-way relation: Products with SKUs above will be added to the Related Product List of the selected ones.
column2: One-way relation: Products with SKUs above will be added to the Related Product List of the selected ones.

column1: Mutual-way relation: The same as one-way, but do one step further: The selected ones are also added to the Related Product List of the products with SKUs above.
column2: Mutual-way relation: The same as one-way, but do one step further: The selected ones are also added to the Related Product List of the products with SKUs above.
